Title: Giants show off home jerseys with a new addition on the back
Description: The Giants announced last year that they would start wearing names on the backs of their home jerseys during the 2021 season. Players wore the new ones during photo day on Tuesday at Scottsdale Stadium and the team's social media account gave a first look on Twitter: The nameless cream jerseys were a favorite of former owner Peter Magowan,
Author: NBC Sports
